blockquote.p: TLDR: ₹16.16 Lakh in unmarked bills were pulled from a Mercedes in Vashi. Election season is here, and suddenly everyone is getting frisked.

description.p: The NMMC's election watchdogs had a busy lunch hour yesterday. At 12:35 PM, a Mercedes-Benz cruising through Vashi got the tap on the window. Turns out, it wasn't carrying groceries.
Instead, officials found ₹16.16 Lakh stashed inside. No immediate explanation was offered. No arrests made, yet. Ju...

item.title: Election Noise Pollution: Politicians' Fireworks Anger Navi Mumbaikars

blockquote.p: TLDR: Politicians are blasting music and setting off fireworks for the election, despite the already terrible air quality. Are they actually trying to make us hate them?

description.p: The election season's here, and with it, the return of the politicians' favorite hobby: annoying everyone. According to a Reddit post on r/NaviMumbai, the politicians are not just blasting music, but setting off firecrackers too. This is happening despite the fact that the AQ...

item.title: Koparkhairane Kids Form Human Chain for Votes

blockquote.p: TLDR: Over 1,100 Koparkhairane students created a human chain to promote voter awareness. Honestly, if kids can do this, adults have no excuse not to vote.

description.p: Koparkhairane saw a heartwarming display of civic responsibility this week, with students, teachers, and parents joining hands (literally) for voter awareness. Forget rallies; these kids are doing it right.
The human chain, organized under the Systematic Voters' Education and Electo...
